DOC.brief_title: Delivery Timing Morbidly Adherent Placentas : Randomized , Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize controlled trial investigate optimal timing delivery clinically stable woman suspect morbidly adherent placenta dispositioned scheduled delivery . The primary outcome assess compare composite neonatal morbidity composite maternal morbidity two group ( delivery 34 versus 36 week gestational age ) .
DOC.criteria: Women monographically morbidly adherent placenta without placenta previa . Scheduled delivery via cesarean hysterectomy Delivery plan prior 36 week ( e.g . nonreassuring fetal status , preterm labor , severe preeclampsia , medical/fetal indication delivery determine manage physician ) .
